name: PinBoss
description:
Pinball game where you must defeat a boss! Collect as many points as you can to hurt him. 

Controls

Z/Left arrow: Left Flipper

X/Right arrow: Right Flipper

Hold and Release SpaceBar: Shoot ball. Use it in the Cannon too.

D: Toggle Debug mode

On Debug mode

I:Activate Bomb

C:Add Combo

V:Reset Combo

L:Instant loss

F5: Re-Charge Scene

Developers:
